title: Calories in Skinny Pop Popcorn
meta_description: Learn calories in skinny pop per serving, plus full nutrition facts like fat, carbs, protein, sodium, and easy tweaks for different flavors.
assumptions: Original flavor, air-popped popcorn, standard serving of 28 g (about 3.5 cups popped), no added toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, batch, and serving size; check packaging for exact values as formulations can change.

quick_answer.text: One 28 g serving of Skinny Pop popcorn provides 150 calories and 2 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp melted butter per serving

faqs.q: How many calories in one serving of skinny pop?
faqs.a: About 150 calories per 28 g serving of original Skinny Pop popcorn.

faqs.q: What are the macros for skinny pop?
faqs.a: Per serving: 10 g fat, 14 g carbs (2 g fiber), 0 g sugars, 2 g protein.

faqs.q: Is skinny pop low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, 75 mg sodium per serving in the original flavor.

faqs.q: How much fiber in skinny pop?
faqs.a: 2 g dietary fiber per 28 g serving, aiding digestion.

faqs.q: Does skinny pop have trans fats?
faqs.a: No trans fats; it's 0 g per serving.
